text.College of Health Professions and Scienc: College of Health Professions and Sciences

p.The Health Sciences minor is designed to: The Health Sciences minor is designed to broaden the student's understanding of health and other clinically related topics. It includes a diverse selection of courses within the healthcare disciplines.

li.Some courses below may have additional p: Some courses below may have additional prerequisite courses required.

courseSection0.text:
The Health Sciences minor is designed to broaden the student's understanding of health and other clinically related topics. It includes a diverse selection of courses within the healthcare disciplines.
  Some courses below may have additional prerequisite courses required.

courseSection1.text5: HSC3432 - Occupational Safety for the Health Care Professional (3)
courseSection1.text8: HSC4008 - Professional Development in Health Professions (3)
courseSection1.text11: HSC4564 - Health Care Needs of the Elderly (3)

li.Majors may not count courses presently r: Majors may not count courses presently required in a department program.
li.A minimum grade of \"C\" (2.0) is requir: A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) is required in all Health Sciences courses.
li.At least 15 hours used in the minor must: At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
li.No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit): No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
li.Internship or Independent Study credit c: Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.

courseSection0.text:
Foreign Language Requirements

None
Total Undergraduate Credit Hours Required: 18

Other Requirements

Majors may not count courses presently required in a department program.
A minimum grade of "C" (2.0) is required in all Health Sciences courses.
At least 15 hours used in the minor must be earned at UCF within the department.
No credit by exam (TSD, Military credit) may be used.
Internship or Independent Study credit cannot be used toward the minor.
